|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43143; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/03/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a large Wi-Fi dongle + USB 2.0 2-port hub combo device. It's branded to be targeted towards usage with the [[RPF Raspberry Pi Model A|'''Raspberry Pi''']] in the FCC photos ('''Egoman''' manufactures the Pi for Chinese and Taiwanese distribution).
The FCC manual seems to indicate it's using BCM43143 (brcmfmac supported..).
The hub IC may be from '''[[Genesys Logic]]'''..
[[Category:English Documentation]]
